high_descs: Go right and approach the bat on the floor by the wall.
Pick the bat up from the floor near the wall.
Go right and approach the night stand with the green lamp.
Turn the lamp on the night stand on.
anns.task_desc: Turn a light on with a bat in hand.

high_descs: look down and turn right to walk to the wall
pick up the base ball bat that is resting against the wall
turn right to face the bedside table
turn on the desk lamp that is on the bedside table
anns.task_desc: turn on the bedside lamp while holding a base ball bat

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the baseball bat on the floor.
Pick up the bat from the floor.
Turn right and walk to the desk lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a baseball bat by the light of a desk lamp.
